TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compiler extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider and System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler. The CSharpCodeProvider and CodeDom ICodeCompiler provide a much richer set of functionality for specifying how to launch the compiler.")

Docs.summary:
**NOTE: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is [CSharpCodeProvider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/tteyf242\(v=vs.90\)).
Managed wrapper for the C\# compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To compile C\# code in-process, call <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.Compiler.Compile(System.String[],System.String[],System.String,System.String[],System.Collections.IDictionary)>.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile (string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, System.Collections.IDictionary options);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile(string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, class System.Collections.IDictionary options) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compile (sourceTexts As String(), sourceTextNames As String(), target As String, imports As String(), options As IDictionary) As CompilerError()

public: static cli::array <Microsoft::CSharp::CompilerError ^> ^ Compile(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTexts, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTextNames, System::String ^ target, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ imports, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ options);
static member Compile : string[] * string[] * string * string[] * System.Collections.IDictionary -> Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[]

Docs.param: An array of type string, each with C\# code.
An array of type string that contains the file names for each sourceTexts.
The output file name. This argument is required.
An array of type string, with files to reference.
Docs.summary: Compiles the given C\# sources to the specified destination file.
Docs.returns: Returns diagnostic messages as an array of type . If the array is empty or all elements are warnings, the compilation succeeded.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each string in the sourceTexts parameter is the equivalent of a single source file. There must be at least one sourceTexts element.
The file names in the sourceTextNames parameter are used for compiler diagnostics and debug information. The array is required, but it can be locally overridden by use of the \#line directive. The array must have the same number of elements as the sourceTexts parameter.
The imports parameter is the same as the /reference compiler option. This parameter can be nulla null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
For the options parameter, the key is the short form of the compiler option. The value is the value desired for the option. The options parameter can be nulla null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). Some compiler options are not recognized. Recognized options and value:
| Key Name | Usage | | --- | --- | | addmodule | List of modules to include in this assembly. The module names must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/addmodule (Import Metadata) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1s46f83c(v=vs.90)). | | baseaddress | Base address for libraries. Value must be of type [UInt32](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ctys3981(v=vs.90)). See [/baseaddress (Specify Base Address of DLL) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b1awdekb(v=vs.90)). | | bugreport | Produces bug report file. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/bugreport (Report a Problem) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/kaky3xy9(v=vs.90)). | | checked | Set default expression evaluation to checked (or unchecked). Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). See [/checked (Check Integer Arithmetic) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/h25wtyxf(v=vs.90)). | | d | List of semicolon separated symbols to define. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/define (Preprocessor Definition) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0feaad6z(v=vs.90)). | | debug | Emit debug information with output. Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). Full or pdb-only cannot be specified. See [/debug (Emit Debugging Information) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8cw0bt21(v=vs.90)). | | doc | File name to put XML comments in. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/doc (Process Documentation Comments) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/3260k4x7(v=vs.90)). | | filealign | PE section alignment size. Value must be of type [UInt32](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ctys3981(v=vs.90)). See [/filealign (Specify Section Alignment) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0s4tzdf2(v=vs.90)). | | incr | Enable incremental rebuild. Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). | | lib | Additional paths to search when locating modules and referenced assemblies. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/lib (Specify Assembly Reference Locations) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s5bac5fx(v=vs.90)). | | linkres | Link a managed resource to the assembly. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/linkresource (Link to .NET Framework Resource) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/xawyf94k(v=vs.90)). | | m | Type to search in for the Main method. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/main (Specify Location of Main Method) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/x3eht538(v=vs.90)). | | nostdlib | Do not auto-reference mscorlib.dll. Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). See [/nostdlib (Do Not Import Standard Library) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/fa13yay7(v=vs.90)). | | nowarn | List of semicolon separated warning numbers to not report. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/nowarn (Suppress Specified Warnings) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/7f28x9z3(v=vs.90)). | | o | Enable compiler optimizations. Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). See [/optimize (Enable/Disable Optimizations) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/t0hfscdc(v=vs.90)). | | r | Referenced assemblies. Value must be of type String. If more than one assembly is specified, the file name must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. See [/reference (Import Metadata) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/yabyz3h4(v=vs.90)). | | res | Embed a managed resource. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/resource (Embed Resource File to Output) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c0tyye07(v=vs.90)). | | target | Output file target type, one of the following: "library", "exe", "winexe", or "module". Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/target (Specify Output File Format) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/6h25dztx(v=vs.90)). | | unsafe | Allow unsafe constructs. Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). See [/unsafe (Enable Unsafe Mode) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ct597kb0(v=vs.90)). | | w | Warning level (0-4). Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/warn (Specify Warning Level) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/13b90fz7(v=vs.90)). | | warnaserror | Report warning diagnostics as errors. Value must be of type [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/a28wyd50(v=vs.90)). See [/warnaserror (Treat Warnings as Errors) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/406xhdz3(v=vs.90)). | | win32icon | Win32 icon for auto generated Win32 resource. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/win32icon (Import an .ico File) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2aaxe43f(v=vs.90)). | | win32res | Win32 resource file. Value must be of type [String](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/s1wwdcbf(v=vs.90)). See [/win32res (Import a Win32 Resource File) (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8f2f5x2e(v=vs.90)). |

exception.p: sourceTexts is nulla null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
sourceTextNames is nulla null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
target is nulla null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
sourceTextNames is not the same size as sourceTexts.
